name: Navkar Cheritable Trust
briefDescription: Our Oraganisation run Blood Bank from last ten years at Mahuva port.We provided Blood to 42 thallessemia, 12 sickle cell , and 4 hemophiliya patient with out replacement and at free of charge.Also provided 300 unit of blood for needy patient at every month. we also work for thallessemia and AIDS awareness .
